text: Zhenzhu chuangzao nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ranhou, shi nimen chengwei pei'ou. Renhe nuren de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi jian bushi tasuo zhidao de; zengjia changming zhe de shoushu, jianshao duanming zhe de nianling, wu yi jian bu jilu zai tian jing zhong; na dui zhenzhu que shi rongyi de.
